articles.title: The DOJ’s Apple Ruling Could Spark the Super App Revolution and Redefine Retail
articles.content: Bolt’s Ryan Breslow talks to WWD about how the Apple anti-monopoly ruling is poised to redefine digital commerce and consumer experiences.

articles.title: Nvidia Overtakes Microsoft as Largest U.S. Company by Market Cap
articles.content: Nvidia has overtaken Microsoft as the largest U.S. company by market value, regaining the throne that it forfeited during the AI-stock selloff in late January.  Nvidia shares rose 2.9% during Tuesday’s trading.  It had a market capitalization of $3.45 trillion, compared with Microsoft’s $3.44 trillion, as of Tuesday's close, according to Dow Jones Market Data.

articles.title: Nvidia reclaims crown as world's most valuable company as $1 trillion rally continues
articles.content: Nvidia on Tuesday overtook Microsoft as the world's most valuable company Tuesday, with the AI chipmaker's market capitalization of $3.444 trillion eclipsing the software giant's $3.441 trillion.

articles.title: Magnificent Seven Earnings Triple S&P Peers
articles.content: FactSet shows Mag 7 earnings growth nearly three times that of the other 493 firms

articles.title: These 2 Tech Titans Generate Substantial Cash: MSFT & AAPL
articles.content: Companies with strong cash-generating abilities are great targets, as they have the ability to fuel growth, pay out dividends, and easily wipe out debt.

articles.title: Apple tells Met to embrace ‘traditional policing’ in clash over phone thefts
articles.content: Apple has told the Metropolitan Police to focus on “traditional policing” to tackle a surge in mobile phone thefts.

articles.title: OpenAI's $6.4 Billion Hardware Gamble Exposes the Closed AI Trap
articles.content: The group’s massive bet on Jony Ive's hardware venture isn't a strategy. It's desperation, says Shaw Walters, the founder of Eliza Labs, and creator of ElizaOS.

articles.title: A Short Strangle Apple Stock Trade Brings High Premiums — And High Risk
articles.content: Apple stock is showing higher implied volatility than normal. Option traders can take advantage of that by selling a short strangle.

articles.title: Apple's pause on the AI race: What to know
articles.content: Apple's (AAPL) artificial intelligence (AI) ambitions seem to have been put on pause, with no major AI announcements expected at the company's Worldwide Developers Conference next week. Yahoo Finance Technology Editor Dan Howley explains that Apple is focusing more on OS improvements and opening AI tools to developers rather than unveiling breakthrough AI features. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
